InstalledItem.Name: Stronghold
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Basilisk
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Stronghold shield generator uses patented hull plating techniques to reinforce the generators body to make it one of the sturdiest on the market. That means the shield and component are both built to last.

InstalledItem.Name: Diligence
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

Though the Diligence delivers high performance compared to other components in its class, this power plants dependability and ease of maintenance is what makes it a favorite of haulers.

InstalledItem.Name: Diligence
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

Though the Diligence delivers high performance compared to other components in its class, this power plants dependability and ease of maintenance is what makes it a favorite of haulers.

InstalledItem.Name: CoolCore
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk 
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The name CoolCore says it all. Designed by Juno Starwerk to be as hardworking as you are, this cooler helps ensure that your entire ship operates well within desired temperature parameters.

InstalledItem.Name: CoolCore
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk 
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The name CoolCore says it all. Designed by Juno Starwerk to be as hardworking as you are, this cooler helps ensure that your entire ship operates well within desired temperature parameters.

InstalledItem.Name: Bolon
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk 
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

Dont let lesser craftsmanship put you and your precious cargo at risk. The Bolon industrial quantum drive was built with durability in mind to keep it working when you need it most.

InstalledItem.Name: Surveyor
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: Chimera Communications
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Surveyor radar from Chimera Communications does away with all the unnecessary extras other manufacturers hide behind to focus on what matters: signature and emission detection that works the way you need it to.

InstalledItem.Name: Surveyor
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: Chimera Communications
Size: 2

InstalledItem.Name: Chernykh
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: WillsOp
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Chernykh is named after the famed 26th century engineer who designed some of the most prized radars of that era. This medium radar from WillsOp celebrates both the look and performance of those classic components.
